title: Number of road deaths in Switzerland 2006 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of fatalities has decreased over the Year.
Number of fatalities is roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2015, and finally slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2016.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2012 and 2013.
Maximum Number of fatalities, about 339.0 was reported at Year 2012
The lowest Number of fatalities, of value 216.0 was reported at Year 2016
